name: Reflective
description:
Reflective, is a simple platform game, where you just have to keep up with the pace.

Yes, that's pretty much it. Just jump through the red circles, and don't hit touch them.

Your gravity will turn upwards, so you will have to jump through the hoops upside-down, of course, without colliding with the orange circles.

You will see triangles while jumping, but don't worry, you're OK.

Play #Reflective when:

◉ You're in for a wild time with your phone!!!

◉ You need a fast paced one tough game

◉ Your girlfriend/boyfriend left you... again! Or if you DON'T have a girlfriend or boyfriend.

And well, if for some reason you like the game and want to support further updates, please write or update your review on the AppStore!

Thanks

XOXO
